action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢
DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. The outer border consists of empty cells. The inner 3x3 square is filled with X's, except for the center cell which is empty.

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. The top row has two Xs in the center. The second row has a single X in the center. The third row has an X in the second column and two Xs in the last two columns. The fourth and fifth rows are identical, with three consecutive Xs in the center columns.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. The outer border consists of empty cells. The inner 3x3 square is filled with X's, except for the center cell which is empty.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In your grid, is there a single empty cell surrounded by Xs in the center of the grid?

The third row has an X in the second column and two Xs in the last two columns. The fourth and fifth rows are identical, with three consecutive Xs in the center columns.
